Reviews.Title: Easy of use, very good indoor shots, and nice WI-FI
Reviews.Author: roomx "look around"
Reviews.Content: + Easy of use+ Picture quality+ WI-FI+ Tiltscreen and video function is really good- Built in flash is not basically useless (unless it is outdoor shots, daytime, for fill-in)- The touch screen kind of sucks, and you wind up using the buttons instead- Price- Tele lens is a bit to chubby for the camera, really.All in all very satisfied with these package, though I rarely use the tele. Remember to get a polarfilter, it will fit both lenses.

Reviews.Title: I bought the 5r
Reviews.Author: O. Nemeth
Reviews.Content: I have the NEX-5r and I LOVE IT!It is such a great size for such a high quality camera. I wish I got the 6 or the 7 since they have the built in viewfinder and flash, but it isn't a huge deal breaker for me.The proprietary port accessories are QUITE expensive, so I don't see myself buying the nicer flash or viewfinder any time soon.

Reviews.Title: Pro features, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: pat o'fallon
Reviews.Content: Before buying this camera, I must have read a hundred different reviews. Most of them sounded like the reviewer was disappointed in the camera and it's features. Well, I bought the camera about a week ago and I'm having a hard time understanding all the negativity.The kit I purchased was generous in it's value for what I spent and the camera arrived in a couple of days. The cameras construction is solid, not as plastic as I thought it might be. It's compact enough to slip into a jacket pocket and carry around without any inconvenience. The controls are easy to understand and with a little study, easy to use. The picture quality is unbelievable. I've taken outdoor pictures at night in intelligent mode that look professional and I am a complete novice. I bought this camera for my wife who has an eye for photos but knows nothing about photography, she loves it. This is a pro quality camera that is suitable for the point and shoot photographer. The videos are clear and in focus and easy to take. All said this was a great purchase and I would recommend the camera to anyone who wants to take better pictures. A great value and an excellent piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: NEX-5R
Reviews.Author: Zong
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this item, Nex-5R. It takes fabulous pictures everywhere i go. Recommend to all photographers to buy this camera..it's a great camera by far...thank you!

Reviews.Title: I luv it
Reviews.Author: Eliezer Llanos Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This is the complement of your second half, whatever you don't know it will show you and do it for you!!.. Light weight and has everything you need!!

Reviews.Title: Sony 5r
Reviews.Author: Martin Brandhøj Christensen
Reviews.Content: Love my new Sony 5r .... Really good in low light and the wifi part rocks. I miss a built in GPS though.

Reviews.Title: Don't expect this with any expediency
Reviews.Author: Gregory Joern
Reviews.Content: Took over 2 weeks to get here, and the SD card took an extra day after that, but other then that it was a good deal. Camera is great, and the telephoto is new as far as I can tell, comes in the original box. Everything else is kinda cheap, but honestly, I just bought it because it was the best deal I could get with the telephoto. If you want the NEX 5R with the telephoto lens, this is the way to go, just don't expect it quick.
